meanings.definition: To make something smaller or reduce in size.
meanings.sent1: She dumbsizes her wardrobe by donating old clothes.
meanings.sent2: The company dumbsizes its workforce to save money.
meanings.sent3: He dumbsizes his collection of toys to make room for new ones.
meanings.sent4: The chef dumbsizes the portions to control food waste.
meanings.sent5: The gardener dumbsizes the plants to fit them in smaller pots.

meanings.definition: To simplify or make less complex.
meanings.sent1: The teacher dumbsizes the math problem for the students to understand.
meanings.sent2: She dumbsizes the instructions to make them easier to follow.
meanings.sent3: He dumbsizes the recipe so even beginners can cook it.
meanings.sent4: The designer dumbsizes the logo for better readability.
meanings.sent5: The author dumbsizes the language to reach a wider audience.

meanings.definition: To belittle or make someone feel inferior.
